name: FireForFun
description:
WARNING :

This Game Is For Professionals ONLY

CONTROLS :

W,A,S,D - Movement

Left Control - Crouch/Slide

Space Bar - Jump

LEFT Mouse - Fire

RIGHT Mouse - Aim

Scroll Wheel Down - Zoom In Scope

Scroll Wheel Up - Zoom Out In Scope

R - Reload (HOLD To Reload)

Tab - Respawn
